mapper.update: UPDATE INVOICE_HEADER_INH SET WEIGHT_INH = #{weight} , NO_OF_BOXES_INH = #{noOfBoxes} , UPDATED_BY_INH = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_ON_INH = GETDATE() WHERE INVOICE_NO_INH = #{invoiceNo}
mapper.insert: insert into INVOICE_HEADER_INH (ID_INH,INVOICE_NO_INH,ID_TYPE_SLV_INH,ID_STATUS_SLV_INH,ID_TEM_INH,ID_RCT_INH,ADDRESS_LINE_1_INH,ADDRESS_STATE_INH,ADDRESS_CITY_INH,ADDRESS_ZIP_INH,NOTES_INH, ID_TRN_INH,CREATED_ON_INH,CREATED_BY_INH,UPDATED_ON_INH,UPDATED_BY_INH,ID_RCT_DESG_ULV_INH) values ( #{id},(SELECT MAX(INVOICE_NO_INH) FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH) + 1,#{type},#{statusId},#{teamId},#{recipientId}, '','','','',#{notes},#{transporterId},GETDATE(),#{createdBy},GETDATE(),#{updatedBy},#{designationId})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(INVOICE_NO_INH) FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH
mapper.insert: insert into INVOICE_HEADER_INH (ID_INH,INVOICE_NO_INH,ID_TYPE_SLV_INH,ID_STATUS_SLV_INH,ID_TEM_INH,ID_RCT_INH,ADDRESS_LINE_1_INH,ADDRESS_STATE_INH,ADDRESS_CITY_INH,ADDRESS_ZIP_INH,NOTES_INH, ID_TRN_INH,CREATED_ON_INH,CREATED_BY_INH,UPDATED_ON_INH,UPDATED_BY_INH) values ( #{id},(SELECT MAX(INVOICE_NO_INH) FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH) + 1,#{type},#{statusId},#{teamId},#{recipientId}, '','','','',#{notes},#{transporterId},GETDATE(),#{createdBy},GETDATE(),#{updatedBy})

insert into INVOICE_HEADER_INH (ID_INH,INVOICE_NO_INH,ID_TYPE_SLV_INH,ID_STATUS_SLV_INH,ID_TEM_INH,ID_RCT_INH,ADDRESS_LINE_1_INH,ADDRESS_STATE_INH,ADDRESS_CITY_INH,ADDRESS_ZIP_INH,NOTES_INH, ID_TRN_INH,CREATED_ON_INH,CREATED_BY_INH,UPDATED_ON_INH,UPDATED_BY_INH) values ( #{id},(SELECT MAX(INVOICE_NO_INH) FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH) + 1,#{type},#{statusId},#{teamId},#{recipientId}, '','','','',#{notes},#{transporterId},GETDATE(),#{createdBy},GETDATE(),#{updatedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT INH.*,SLV.NAME_SLV,TEM.NAME_TEM,TRN.NAME_TRN,ULV.NAME_ULV,RCT.NAME_RCT FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = INH.ID_TEM_INH JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = INH.ID_STATUS_SLV_INH JOIN TRANSPORTER_TRN TRN ON TRN.ID_TRN = INH.ID_TRN_INH JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = INH.ID_RCT_DESG_ULV_INH JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON RCT.ID_RCT = INH.ID_RCT_INH WHERE ID_INH = #{id}

SELECT distinct inh.ID_INH as 'inhId', inh.INVOICE_NO_INH as 'invoiceNumber', ulv.NAME_ULV as 'employeeDesignation', dtm.ID_DTM as 'employeeId', dtm.NAME_DTM as 'employeeName', dtm.CODE_DTM as 'employeeCode', inh.ADDRESS_LINE_1_INH as 'employeeAddress', inh.ADDRESS_CITY_INH as 'employeeCity', inh.ADDRESS_STATE_INH as 'employeeState', inh.ADDRESS_ZIP_INH as 'employeePinCode', inh.PHONE_INH as 'employeeMobileNumber', inh.LR_NUMBER_INH as 'employeeLRNumber', GETDATE() as 'employeeDate', inh.CREATED_ON_INH as 'employeeLRDate', tem.NAME_TEM as 'employeeTeam', trn.NAME_TRN as 'employeeTransport', '' as 'employeePermitNo', inh.CFA_INH as 'employeeCFA', inh.NO_OF_BOXES_INH as 'employeeTotalNoOfCases', inh.WEIGHT_INH as 'employeeTotalWeight', dip.ID_DIP as 'dipId', dip.REMARKS_DIP as 'employeeRemark', dip.MONTH_DIP as month, dip.YEAR_DIP as year, dip.IS_SPECIAL_DIP as 'isSpecial', dip.QTR_DIP as 'qtr', inh.ID_TEM_INH as teamId, inh.SAMPLE_VALUE_INH as 'employeeSampleValue', inh.OTHER_ITEM_VALUE_INH as 'employeeInputValue', inh.SAMPLE_VALUE_INH + inh.OTHER_ITEM_VALUE_INH as 'employeeValue', CASE WHEN DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = '1' THEN 'SPECIAL' WHEN DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = '0' THEN 'MONTHLY' ELSE 'Unknown AllocationType' END AS 'type', ETY.NAME_ETY AS 'legalEty' FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH JOIN INVOICE_DETAIL_IND IND ON INH.ID_INH = IND.ID_INH_IND JOIN INVENTORY_INV INV ON IND.ID_INV_IND = INV.ID_INV JOIN ITEM_MASTER_ITM ITM ON IND.ID_ITM_IND = ITM.ID_ITM JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON RCT.ID_RCT = INH.ID_RCT_INH JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = INH.ID_TEM_INH JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = INH.ID_RCT_DESG_ULV_INH JOIN INVOICE_DISPATCH_PLAN_IDP IDP ON IDP.ID_INH_IDP = INH.ID_INH JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = IDP.ID_PLAN_IDP JOIN TRANSPORTER_TRN TRN ON TRN.ID_TRN = INH.ID_TRN_INH JOIN TEAM_LEGAL_ENTITY_TET TET ON TET.ID_TEM_TET = TEM.ID_TEM JOIN LEGAL_ENTITY_MASTER_ETY ETY ON ETY.ID_ETY = TET.ID_ETY_TET WHERE ID_INH = #{id}

SELECT distinct inh.ID_INH as 'inhId', inh.INVOICE_NO_INH as 'invoiceNumber', ulv.NAME_ULV as 'employeeDesignation', rct.ID_RCT as 'employeeId', rct.NAME_RCT as 'employeeName', rct.CODE_RCT as 'employeeCode', inh.ADDRESS_LINE_1_INH as 'employeeAddress', inh.ADDRESS_CITY_INH as 'employeeCity', inh.ADDRESS_STATE_INH as 'employeeState', inh.ADDRESS_ZIP_INH as 'employeePinCode', inh.PHONE_INH as 'employeeMobileNumber', inh.LR_NUMBER_INH as 'employeeLRNumber', CONVERT(varchar(20), inh.CREATED_ON_INH, 105 ) as 'employeeDate', CONVERT(varchar(20), inh.CREATED_ON_INH, 105 ) 'employeeLRDate', tem.NAME_TEM as 'employeeTeam', trn.NAME_TRN as 'employeeTransport', '' as 'employeePermitNo', inh.CFA_INH as 'employeeCFA', inh.NO_OF_BOXES_INH as 'employeeTotalNoOfCases', inh.WEIGHT_INH as 'employeeTotalWeight', dip.ID_DIP as 'dipId', dip.REMARKS_DIP as 'employeeRemark', dip.MONTH_DIP as month, dip.YEAR_DIP as year, dip.IS_SPECIAL_DIP as 'isSpecial', dip.QTR_DIP as 'qtr', inh.ID_TEM_INH as teamId, inh.SAMPLE_VALUE_INH as 'employeeSampleValue', inh.OTHER_ITEM_VALUE_INH as 'employeeInputValue', inh.SAMPLE_VALUE_INH + inh.OTHER_ITEM_VALUE_INH as 'employeeValue', CASE WHEN DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = '1' THEN 'SPECIAL' WHEN DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = '0' THEN 'MONTHLY' ELSE 'Unknown AllocationType' END AS 'TYPE', ETY.NAME_ETY AS 'LEGAL' FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH JOIN INVOICE_DETAIL_IND IND ON INH.ID_INH = IND.ID_INH_IND JOIN INVENTORY_INV INV ON IND.ID_INV_IND = INV.ID_INV JOIN ITEM_MASTER_ITM ITM ON IND.ID_ITM_IND = ITM.ID_ITM JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON RCT.ID_RCT = INH.ID_RCT_INH JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = INH.ID_TEM_INH JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = INH.ID_RCT_DESG_ULV_INH JOIN INVOICE_DISPATCH_PLAN_IDP IDP ON IDP.ID_INH_IDP = INH.ID_INH JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = IDP.ID_PLAN_IDP JOIN TRANSPORTER_TRN TRN ON TRN.ID_TRN = INH.ID_TRN_INH JOIN TEAM_LEGAL_ENTITY_TET TET ON TET.ID_TEM_TET = TEM.ID_TEM JOIN LEGAL_ENTITY_MASTER_ETY ETY ON ETY.ID_ETY = TET.ID_ETY_TET WHERE ID_INH = #{id}

select SUM(IND.VALUE_IND+(IND.VALUE_IND*RATE_PER_IND/100)) AS sampleValue from INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH JOIN INVOICE_DETAIL_IND IND ON IND.ID_INH_IND = INH.ID_INH JOIN SAMPLE_MASTER_SMP SMP ON SMP.ID_SMP = IND.ID_ITM_IND WHERE ID_INH = #{id}

select SUM(IND.VALUE_IND+(IND.VALUE_IND*RATE_PER_IND/100)) AS inputValue from INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH JOIN INVOICE_DETAIL_IND IND ON IND.ID_INH_IND = INH.ID_INH JOIN ITEM_MASTER_ITM ITM ON ITM.ID_ITM = IND.ID_ITM_IND WHERE ID_INH = #{id}
{ call PROC_GetInvoiceDetailsForPrint ( #{InhID, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN})}
{ call PROC_GetGroupingInvoiceForHUB ( #{FromDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN}, #{ToDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN}, #{InvoiceNumber, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN}) }
{ call PROC_GetInvoicesForGrouping ( #{FromDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN}, #{ToDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN}, #{InvoiceNumber, jdbcType = VARCHAR , mode = IN}) }
select id_inh as 'inhId' , invoice_no_inh as 'invoiceNo' from INVOICE_HEADER_INH

SELECT trn.NAME_TRN AS transporterName , inh.LR_NUMBER_INH AS lRNumber , inh.INVOICE_NO_INH AS invoiceNo , inh.CREATED_ON_INH AS invoiceDate , rct.CODE_RCT AS recipientCode , rct.NAME_RCT AS recipientName , ulv.NAME_ULV AS recipientDesgination , inh.ADDRESS_LINE_1_INH + inh.ADDRESS_LINE_2_INH AS recipientAddress, inh.ADDRESS_CITY_INH AS recipientCity, inh.ADDRESS_STATE_INH AS recipientState , inh.PHONE_INH AS recipientPhone , inh.ADDRESS_ZIP_INH AS recipientPinCode , rct.HEAD_QUARTER_RCT AS recipientHeadQuarter , tem.NAME_TEM AS teamName , inh.NO_OF_BOXES_INH AS noOfBoxes , inh.WEIGHT_INH AS 'weight' , inh.DIMENSION_INH AS dimension FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH join TRANSPORTER_TRN TRN on inh.ID_TRN_INH = trn.ID_TRN join RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT on inh.ID_RCT_INH = rct.ID_RCT join TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM on rct.ID_TEM_RCT = tem.ID_TEM join USER_LOV_ULV ULV on rct.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT = ulv.ID_ULV WHERE ID_INH = #{id} UNION SELECT trn.NAME_TRN AS transporterName , inh.LR_NUMBER_INH AS lRNumber , inh.INVOICE_NO_INH AS invoiceNo , inh.CREATED_ON_INH AS invoiceDate , dtm.CODE_DTM AS recipientCode , dtm.NAME_DTM AS recipientName , ulv.NAME_ULV AS recipientDesgination , inh.ADDRESS_LINE_1_INH + inh.ADDRESS_LINE_2_INH AS recipientAddress, inh.ADDRESS_CITY_INH AS recipientCity, inh.ADDRESS_STATE_INH AS recipientState , inh.PHONE_INH AS recipientPhone , inh.ADDRESS_ZIP_INH AS recipientPinCode , inh.CFA_INH AS recipientHeadQuarter , tem.NAME_TEM AS teamName , inh.NO_OF_BOXES_INH AS noOfBoxes , inh.WEIGHT_INH AS 'weight' , inh.DIMENSION_INH AS dimension FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH join TRANSPORTER_TRN TRN on inh.ID_TRN_INH = trn.ID_TRN join DOCTOR_MASTER_DTM DTM on inh.ID_RCT_INH = dtm.ID_DTM join TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM on dtm.ID_TEM_DTM = tem.ID_TEM join USER_LOV_ULV ULV on dtm.ID_DESG_ULV_DTM = ulv.ID_ULV WHERE ID_INH = #{id}

SELECT INH.* FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT JOIN INVOICE_HEADER_INH INH ON INH.ID_RCT_INH = RCT.ID_RCT JOIN INVOICE_DISPATCH_PLAN_IDP IDP ON IDP.ID_INH_IDP = INH.ID_INH JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = IDP.ID_PLAN_IDP WHERE DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = '0' AND DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND RCT.ID_RCT = #{recipientId}

SELECT ISNULL(SUM((DID.QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID * RATE_PER_UNIT_INV) + (DID.QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID * RATE_PER_UNIT_INV) * INV.RATE_PER_INV/100),0) as 'sampleItems' FROM SAMPLE_MASTER_SMP SMP JOIN INVENTORY_INV INV ON INV.ID_ITM_INV = SMP.ID_SMP JOIN DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID ON DID.ID_INV_DID = INV.ID_INV JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = DID.ID_DIP_DID WHERE DID.ID_RCT_DID = #{recipientId} AND DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{isSpecial} AND INV.ID_ITC_INV = '242B921C-B27A-497D-9FA1-7222AB6E6F2A'

SELECT ISNULL(SUM((DID.QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID * RATE_PER_UNIT_INV) + (DID.QUANTITY_DISPATCH_DID * RATE_PER_UNIT_INV) * INV.RATE_PER_INV/100),0) as 'nonSampleItems' FROM ITEM_MASTER_ITM ITM JOIN INVENTORY_INV INV ON INV.ID_ITM_INV = ITM.ID_ITM JOIN DISPATCH_DETAIL_DID DID ON DID.ID_INV_DID = INV.ID_INV JOIN DISPATCH_PLAN_DIP DIP ON DIP.ID_DIP = DID.ID_DIP_DID WHERE DID.ID_RCT_DID = #{recipientId} AND DIP.MONTH_DIP = #{month} AND DIP.YEAR_DIP = #{year} AND DIP.IS_SPECIAL_DIP = #{isSpecial} AND INV.ID_ITC_INV IN ('2909F268-96DE-4485-B8E9-673FEC08C9A3','9689A910-F261-48E7-9DCC-7653B092BA7B')
SELECT ID_TRN as 'transporterId',NAME_TRN as 'transporterName' FROM TRANSPORTER_TRN
mapper.insert: insert into INVOICE_HEADER_INH (ID_INH,INVOICE_NO_INH,ID_TYPE_SLV_INH,ID_STATUS_SLV_INH,ID_TEM_INH,ID_RCT_INH,ADDRESS_LINE_1_INH,ADDRESS_LINE_2_INH,ADDRESS_STATE_INH,ADDRESS_CITY_INH,ADDRESS_ZIP_INH, PHONE_INH,WEIGHT_INH,NO_OF_BOXES_INH, ID_TRN_INH,SAMPLE_VALUE_INH,OTHER_ITEM_VALUE_INH,LR_NUMBER_INH,CREATED_ON_INH,CREATED_BY_INH,UPDATED_ON_INH,UPDATED_BY_INH,ID_RCT_DESG_ULV_INH,CFA_INH) values ( #{id},(SELECT MAX(INVOICE_NO_INH) FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH) + 1,#{type},#{statusId},#{teamId},#{recipientId}, #{addressLine1},#{addressLine2},#{states},#{city},#{zip},#{phone},#{weight},#{noOfBoxes},#{transporterId},#{sampleValue},#{otherItemValue},#{lrNumber},GETDATE(),#{createdBy},GETDATE(),#{updatedBy} ,#{designationId},#{cfa})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM INVOICE_HEADER_INH WHERE INVOICE_NO_INH = #{invoiceNo}
